item.title: Dev snapshot: Godot 4.4 dev 5
item.description: With GodotCon behind us and our developers recuperated, we're thrilled to return to a more frequent release-cycle.
item.dc:creator: Thaddeus Crews

item.title: GodotCon 24: Berlin Edition
item.description: Our biggest conference yet!
item.dc:creator: Nat

item.title: Dev snapshot: Godot 4.4 dev 4
item.description: After a short delay due to GodotCon, we are back with another exciting update.
item.dc:creator: Clay John

item.title: Dev snapshot: Godot 4.4 dev 3
item.description: We haven't slowed down and are bringing you another feature-packed update!
item.dc:creator: Clay John

item.title: Godot XR update - October 2024
item.description: Looking back at a year of XR development.
item.dc:creator: Bastiaan Olij

item.title: Godot SDK Integrations
item.description: A new GitHub organization to centralize the community efforts to provide support for third-party SDKs for Godot.
item.dc:creator: Godot Foundation

item.title: Godot Rendering Priorities: September 2024
item.description: 4.3 is out. It's time for an update!
item.dc:creator: Clay John

item.title: Godot Editor on the Meta Horizon Store
item.description: Introducing the Godot Editor for Meta Quest (Horizon OS) devices
item.dc:creator: Fredia Huya-Kouadio

item.title: Dev snapshot: Godot 4.4 dev 2
item.description: The PR harvest keeps going strongly for Godot 4.4, with massive new features such as typed dictionaries and error-less project import!
item.dc:creator: Rémi Verschelde

item.title: Godot 3.6 finally released!
item.description: After 2 years of development, Godot 3.6 is finally out and it comes fully packed with features and quality of life improvements! This includes 2D physics interpolation and hierarchical culling, and 3D mesh merging, level of detail, tighter shadow culling, ORM materials, and more.
item.dc:creator: lawnjelly

item.title: Submissions open for Godot 2024 showreel!
item.description: Showcase your Godot creations in 2024! We're inviting submissions of short videos featuring your published or in-progress Godot games or tools. Don't miss this chance to be a part of it!
item.dc:creator: Emi

item.title: About Official Console Ports
item.description: With this post we aim to address the community’s questions about the lack of official console ports through the Godot Foundation.
item.dc:creator: Emi

item.title: Meeting the community at gamescom 2024
item.description: Back from gamescom, ready to report.
item.dc:creator: Nat

item.title: Dev snapshot: Godot 4.4 dev 1
item.description: The first snapshot after releasing 4.3, already packed with new features!
item.dc:creator: Clay John

item.title: Godot 4.3, a shared effort
item.description: With over 3,500 commits authored by over 500 contributors, the latest Godot Engine release comes packed full of new features and improvements.
item.dc:creator: Godot contributors

item.title: Design of the Skeleton Modifier 3D
item.description: We have reworked the skeleton bone update process to add SkeletonModifier3D for modifying the Skeleton.
item.dc:creator: Silc Renew

item.title: Release candidate: Godot 4.3 RC 3
item.description: With all known major regressions fixed, we are now publishing a third release candidate to confirm that 4.3 is ready to go stable.
item.dc:creator: Rémi Verschelde

item.title: Gamescom here we come!
item.description: We are once again attending gamescom, and organizing two meet-up opportunities this time.
item.dc:creator: Nat

item.title: Introducing the improved ufbx importer in Godot 4.3
item.description: Godot 4.3 now includes native .fbx support
item.dc:creator: Lyuma

item.title: Release candidate: Godot 4.3 RC 2
item.description: After a week in the Release Candidate stage, we have squashed most bugs we were still tracking for 4.3, and are ready for a second candidate.
item.dc:creator: Rémi Verschelde

item.title: Release candidate: Godot 4.3 RC 1
item.description: We are cautiously optimistic that Godot 4.3 is ready for release, please test it and let us know if we are right!
item.dc:creator: Rémi Verschelde

item.title: Dev snapshot: Godot 4.3 beta 3
item.description: We are nearing the end of the beta phase for Godot 4.3, which is shaping up to be a very solid release, solving a lot of pain points.
item.dc:creator: Rémi Verschelde

item.title: New Dev Fund Perks: Discord Role and Forum Badge
item.description: Proudly display your support on our community platforms.
item.dc:creator: Winston Yallow

item.title: Release candidate: Godot 3.6 RC 1
item.description: We are now at the Release Candidate stage, finalizing everything so that we can release 3.6-stable for all users.
item.dc:creator: lawnjelly
